title: texture
description: A texture is a set of images, with some parameters specific to the texture/uv mapping to geometries.

encoding.description: MIMEtype[1..*] The encoding/content type that is used by all images in this map

items.description: UV wrapping modes, from {none, repeat, mirror}

atlas.description: True if the Map represents a texture atlas.

uvSet.description: The name of the UV set to be used as texture coordinates.

channels.description: Indicates which channels are stored in which channel of this map. Possible values: h=brightness, r=red, g=green, b=blue, a=alpha, n=bump, d=displacement.
